row.process:
!Return OS Name and version !! @echo off
echo Getting OS information.. "%SYSTEMROOT%\system32\systeminfo.exe" | findstr /B /C:"OS Name" /C:"OS Version"
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS

row.post_process:
:SET &HND#=PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",,"REP") :PROCESS &HND# : SET &RET# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : P &RET# : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&RET#,"OS Name: ") : IF &POS# <> 0 : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&RET#,":") : SET &POS# = ADD(&POS#,1) : SET &ANAME# = STR_CUT(&RET#,&POS#) : SET &ANAME# = STR_TRIM(&ANAME#) : PSET &UC4RB_OS_NAME# = &ANAME# : ENDIF : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&RET#,"OS Version: ") : IF &POS# <> 0 : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&RET#,":") : SET &POS# = ADD(&POS#,1) : SET &AVER# = STR_CUT(&RET#,&POS#) : SET &AVER# = STR_TRIM(&AVER#) : PSET &UC4RB_OS_VERSION# = &AVER# : ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
